sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Bold Eagle Acquisition Corp. (BEAG) reports earnings
feed.summary: Bold Eagle Acquisition Corp. (BEAG) filed its Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2024, reporting $260 million in a trust account and a net income of over $2 million. The blank check company, which completed its IPO in October 2024, has not yet identified a target for a business combination and has not generated any revenue.
